name: Western Green Mamba
description: Sometimes called the green mamba, it has a greenish body dorsally and a yellow tail. This coloration serves as camouflage among the branches of trees and bushes inhabited by this venomous snake.
image_alt: Western green mamba, photo: Prague Zoo archive
proportions: Length up to 230 cm; weight up to 4 kg
breeding: We do not currently keep this species.
